response.job_title: DevOps Engineer at PayU| Mechatronics Engineer | Volunteer investigator at LabFabEx | Cloud and Disruptive Technologies
response.summary:
Devops Engineer para PayU Latam, con interés especial en inteligencia artificial, machine learning, block chain y tecnologías disruptivas. 
El arte en todas sus formas de mueve en el día a día y soy una entusiasta de los videojuegos y la interdisciplinariedad que conlleva el crear una experiencia que atrape a las personas; conocimiento y pasión que son motores en el desarrollo de mis proyectos profesionales como ingeniera.
Me encanta apoyar razones sociales y saber que mi existencia ayuda a alguien más, entonces si puedo ayudarte ¡no dudes en preguntar!
Mi vehemencia por el conocimiento es lo principal y cualquier aprendizaje que venga en mi camino es bienvenido.
"The future belongs to those who prepare for it today" - Malcom X.
response.skills: Engineering, English, Communication, Analytical Skills, Project Management, Adobe Illustrator, Blender, Artificial Neural Networks, OpenCV, MATLAB, Mastercam, Rockwell Studio 5000, FactoryTalk View, Autodesk Inventor, Robot Operating System (ROS), ABB RobotStudio, Linux, Microsoft Office, Windows, Amazon Web Services (AWS)

profile_positions.title: Community manager del Área Curricular de Ingeniería Mecánica y Mecatrónica, Facultad de Ingeniería

education.grade: Integración de robot SCARA con VR/AR utilizando AWS

company.name: PayU
company.description:
Global reach, local expertise: we combine the best of both worlds to reshape the future of payments and fintech to build a world of unlimited possibilities. We successfully bridge the global and local gap by supplying ultimate global payment coverage with extensive local expertise and support.   

Our vision is to create a world without financial borders where everyone can prosper. Thus, we strive to shape the payment industry of tomorrow to support global financial inclusion.   

As the payments and fintech business of Prosus- a global consumer internet group and one of the largest technology investors in the world- we are a leading online payment service provider operating
in 50+ high-growth markets, dedicated to creating cutting-edge financial services tailored to the needs of over 450,000 merchants and millions of consumers.   

Focused on empowering people through financial services and creating a world without financial borders, we have set out to be one of the most prominent investors in the Fintech space, with investments
totaling over $1 billion to date.   

We deploy more than 400 payment methods and PCI-certified platforms to process approximately 10 million payments daily. As a Fintech innovator, we develop cutting-edge technologies to ensure that merchants benefit from the highest approval rates and can optimally expand their global reach.
